abstract: Royal Bank of Scotland and San Diego’s Sempra Energy have hired Lazard to help them seek bidders for their joint commodities-trading business, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: Royal Bank of Scotland and San Diego’s Sempra Energy have hired Lazard to help them seek bidders for their joint commodities-trading business, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Royal Bank of Scotland and San Diego’s Sempra Energy have hired Lazard to help them seek bidders for their joint commodities-trading business, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing several people familiar with the matter.

headline.main: RBS Sempra Owners Said to Eye $3 Billion Sale
